title: Beautiful Luxury Villa Built On 81 Perches Close To Nawaloka Hospital Negombo
details: 5 Bed Rooms Super Luxury Villa Built On 81 Perches. Close To Nawaloka Hospital. Colombo Main Road. 10 Minutes To Colombo International Air Port. One Minute To Negombo Town. Strictly No Brokers. Please Note That We Are Not Affiliated To Any Broker Or An Agent.
